channel.title: [317] [combattscape] --BIG PROJECT- 16,000 downloads
channel.description:
[€edit] 29/08/2011
dear moparscaper's hello, it's now two years ago since I made this server. and I would like to thank the 16,000 people who downloaded this source and used it to host / edit it. Thank you for everyone who gave me fair credits. and for the lots of reply's of people about my grammar I was 15 years old and dutch and dyslectic what did you suspect . I'am now studying JAVA and maybe ill remake this server , to remind me of my runescape child hood . but for now I got to study . Have fun coding . [b] sorry but I wish I could fix this topic (grammar) but ... don't got time . [€edit]
[u][b]Hello,[/b][/u] [2009] [u]I have quited my own server combattscape. I just have been tired of coding so, I have Released my server. I hope you like it, if u dont then go look for another one. I would like to ask that if you use it give me some credits.i only post this here nowhere else. thank you for all the people who supported my server. all the thusands of players even the syi noobs ;) yours truely reverce/bountyleader[/u] [note] the server had 24/7 50-100 players , just to [note] i hope u keep my work alive thanks.
I WORKED VERY LONG ON THIS DONT FLAME SERIOUS.. I WORKED VERY LONG ON THIS DONT FLAME SERIOUS.. I WORKED VERY LONG ON THIS DONT FLAME SERIOUS.. I WORKED VERY LONG ON THIS DONT FLAME SERIOUS..
More About my server.
[ul][li] All the correct weapon emotes + wielding recomendations[/li] [li] status hammer does hit like a hammer (emote) but is 2 haned made for overuse.[/li] [li] I fixed duping by using a timer on trades.[/li] [li] 100 % donater items and donater stuff. see picture .(donater shop only donaters can trade, donater equipment, only a donater can equip.+ donater crown.[/li] [li]I made several teleport commands for the players who dont like just remove it in client.java when you use a teleport command it wont work in combat , it wil not work in wilderness,and it wil use the teleport grafic+ if u use it in a minigame it will say you cant tele away.[/li] [li]pkpoints + pk rewards , i didn't put this in a shop because its faster. look at the picture.[/li] [li]walking lumbridge guide at the corner of the edgeville wilderness to tell the change in the pking rules(new pk rules or whatever)[/li] [li] a special moster killing zone. with green dragons , mages ,... (see picture)(adding soon)[/li] [li]FULL working magic (lunar,ancients,normal spellbook)[/li] [li]Realistic shop prices (junk - cheap . usefulle items - expensive.[/li] [li]fulle working pvp(known bugs (darkbow glitch (special) and dds ags glitch (spec dds,then fast equip ags so u get the hit of double ags)[/li] [li]fully working new food tuna potatos heals 22[/li] [li]perfectly working special attack on every costume (by ex. dclaw(emote+-spec) vesta(emote+spec)hammer(emote+spec) (dds(98%),saradomin sword (ss)(60%)(ags,bgs,sgs,zgs 100 %)[/li][/ul]
[b][i]minigames[/i][/b] [b]all the minigames work[/b], (rsp minigames)
[ul][li]- barrows (replaced new with old)[/li][/ul]
[i]more info :[/i] Removed, newest barrows by old (brining the spirit of rs 2007). barrows does work GUTHAN---heals torag----dharoks----high hit on low hp.veracs---- hits a little bit stronger through prayer, karil lowers run. (ahrim,torag) nothing because there effect is wasteless.
[ul][li]fight pits work fully (not my work)[/li] [li]assult work fully (not my work)[/li] [li]pest control work fully (50% my work i addet all npcs + aggressive)[/li][/ul]
[b][i][u]skills[/u][/i][/b] [b] The following skills work for[/b]
[ul][li]attack, strength , defence, prayer, magic.[/li] [li] runcrafting can be traind for 100%[/li] [li]agilty´i would say 80%[/li] [li]theiving , fletching and crafting 100%[/li] [li] farming (not like rs way just use seeds on ditch and u get herbs) it trains . but because its not like real rs 50 %[/li] [li]cooking , fishing , mining , fletching,farming ,firemaking,smithing,herblore 99% works fully to train 99.allot guides how to train ingame.[/li] [li]slayer 100% working tasks and stuff (like in the most rsp servers)[/li][/ul]
[b][i]others[/i][/b]
[ul][li]bankitem (if u open your bank and you type the command ::bankitem , it will automaticly store all items like in real rs, in next soucre i wil make a butten off it.)[/li] [li]magic trees alot of magic trees ;)[/li] [li]new commands for staff unipmute, and unipban, i just made this because less servers have that.[/li] [li] interface, looks more on a 377 then a 317 (i didnt make the catch that makes it look more then a 377)[/li] [li]also kq,kbd,and gwd works 100% (gwd = generaal graador)[/li] [li]many costumes not to many.dragon platebody (v1 and v2) client related.[/li] [li]This server has a pk ring designed by me, only way to get is by pking ( = pk points). it gives good strengt bonus It was very popular on my server.[/li] [li]Ive made a clanzone, a place where big clans can fight, wanna get here? talk to king arther , he would love to teleport you with your clan.(deep wilderness arena,flags lead you to the enemy clan.)[/li] [li]jad works i made it 8 waves so it doesn't take to long but its still hard.[/li] [li]Name filter (means no offensive names like fuck,slut,...)[/li] [li]anti xlog [note]70% still some problems[note] [/li] [li][s]multi barrage[/s] [deleted]--->when a 126 attacks in multy wildy and a lvl 90 is near him the barrage wil affect dammege to all accounts near the caster even if the lvl diffrence is big.[/li] [li]I have added a skilling zone smithing/mining ---> see picture.[/li] [li] I have added banks to skilling zones, skilling shops and much more[/li][/ul]
[i][b][started not finished][/b][/i]
[ul][li]Items kept on dead (The tagg to see what items u lose [/li] [li]skillcape emotes ( for 317's there stupid , if u know how to put 508 emotes on a 317 gl then you can try it.)[/li][/ul]
[what i'am going to change for the next release ?]
[ul][li]Trying to make a stronger ip ban.[/li][/ul] [b][inprogress][/b]
[ul][li]Perfect Anti-null(rspcrasher bots)[/li][/ul] [b][inprogress][/b]
[ul][li]Anti algofree [/li][/ul] [b][donne][/b]
[ul][li]more is comming soon becous i yust released this one ;)[/li][/ul]
pictures:: [IMG]http://i840.photobucket.com/albums/zz324/massimovanhaver/0000.png[/img] [IMG]http://i840.photobucket.com/albums/zz324/massimovanhaver/0001.png[/img] [IMG]http://i840.photobucket.com/albums/zz324/massimovanhaver/0045.png[/img] [IMG]http://i840.photobucket.com/albums/zz324/massimovanhaver/0056.png[/img] [IMG]http://i840.photobucket.com/albums/zz324/massimovanhaver/0058.png[/img] [IMG]http://i840.photobucket.com/albums/zz324/massimovanhaver/0076.png[/img] [IMG]http://i840.photobucket.com/albums/zz324/massimovanhaver/0096.png[/img] [IMG]http://i840.photobucket.com/albums/zz324/massimovanhaver/0097.png[/img] [IMG]http://i840.photobucket.com/albums/zz324/massimovanhaver/0098.png[/img] [IMG]http://i840.photobucket.com/albums/zz324/massimovanhaver/0102.png[/img] [IMG]http://i840.photobucket.com/albums/zz324/massimovanhaver/0105.png[/img] [IMG]http://i840.photobucket.com/albums/zz324/massimovanhaver/0106.png[/img] [IMG]http://i840.photobucket.com/albums/zz324/massimovanhaver/0109.png[/img] [IMG]http://i840.photobucket.com/albums/zz324/massimovanhaver/0110.png[/img] [IMG]http://i840.photobucket.com/albums/zz324/massimovanhaver/0112.png[/img] [IMG]http://i840.photobucket.com/albums/zz324/massimovanhaver/0131.png[/img] [IMG]http://i840.photobucket.com/albums/zz324/massimovanhaver/antidupepicture.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i840.photobucket.com/albums/zz324/massimovanhaver/0162.png[/img] [IMG]http://i840.photobucket.com/albums/zz324/massimovanhaver/0191.png[/img] [IMG]http://i840.photobucket.com/albums/zz324/massimovanhaver/MININGzone.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i840.photobucket.com/albums/zz324/massimovanhaver/fletching.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i840.photobucket.com/albums/zz324/massimovanhaver/fotoke1.png[/img] [IMG]http://i840.photobucket.com/albums/zz324/massimovanhaver/prayers.jpg[/img]
Source (i gonna make some mirrors in the following hour )[version 2.0] http://www.filefront.com/14046423/cOmbattscape%20soucre%20by%20bounty.rar Client [version 6.0] http://www.filefront.com/14046611/client%20by%20bounty.rar
[size=15pt]please post thank you [/size] [quote="Lin, post:1, topic:281107"]Note: [b]You leech, you die. That or you're just living with the shame to know that you fail and therefore shall no longer be permitted to live.[/b][/quote] [quote="Lin, post:1, topic:281107"]Note: [b]You leech, you die. That or you're just living with the shame to know that you fail and therefore shall no longer be permitted to live.[/b][/quote] [quote="Jimma"]Btw who gives a shit about grammar? ;)[/quote]
THESE CREDITS ARE RIGHT. DONT POST ABOUT IT, I MADE THIS SO I GDM NO FROM WHO I USED STUFF.
[update 16-07]found some new names of makers.,cleaned up topic,better grammer. CREDITS source [b][color=black]50% to delta_ for creating the delta soucre mikto ----> thank you [b] for [/b] helping me [b] out[/b] chassy ---> thank you you helped me solve a big bug . credits for 'stormcutter' with his anti null guide . Delta_ ----> thank you for the empty delta soucre. reverce. (me) /color][/b] CREDITS client. [b][color=black] - creator of woeshiscape. - mitko . - creator of pwnscape. - me ----> fixed few glitches , models .. Sorry if i fergot your name, i only puted the peeps who helped me the most, Also thanks to evryone in the help section who helped me solve problems. [EXTRA] Afther few peeps asked me the same question. [code] Where do i change the ip [/code] client folder > GUI.java file > control +f and look for 127.0.0.1 and change it to the requested ip. [code]How do i make peeps donater ? [code] simply write the name down in the donater file ( u can find it at "config") [code]how do I make peeps donater with a command ? [/code] go into client.java and look for [code]"add"[code] and change bountyleader by your name . [/code][/code][/code][/code]
Tharok :: I EDITED ALL THE PICTURES, ... now remove my warned ? ... thanks.

item.description:
@dragon39990 wrote:

mkti1:

i cant make my self donator please help!

To make yourself a donator go in the source and goto the folder “config” then there is a text document that is called “Donators” add your name in there and it will make you a donator.

I have a problem myslef tho… I can’t get the custom santa hats to go into the head section. I know you are suppose to add the item id in the item text document and I did and it fixed the custom phats but it will not work for the santas HELP!
